quote: “Maybe 'Okay' will be our 'always'...”
author: John Green

quote: “It used to be about trying to do something. Now it's about trying to be someone.”
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: “What would you attempt to do if you knew you could not fail?”
author: Robert Schuller

quote: “The atheist staring from his attic window is often nearer to God than the believer caught up in his own false image of God.”
author: Martin Buber

quote: “Can a dream be wrong? Aren't dreams God's way of telling you things?”
author: Ellen Hopkins

quote: “If I lived a million lives, I would've felt a million feelings and I still would've fallen a million times for you.”
author: robert m drake

quote: “It was stupid to hope, she knew. But sometimes hope was all you had.”
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: “The cause of most of man's unhappiness is sacrificing what he wants most for what he wants now.”
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: “It’s funny, for all it took was a broken heart and that alone was enough, enough for her to do everything she ever dreamed of.”
author: robert m drake

quote: “Sometimes success isn't about making the right decision, it's more about making some decision.”
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: “I am not a victim. No matter what I have been through, I'm still here. I have a history of victory.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “The truth is I didn’t need therapy; I just needed to feel loved and know that someone out there craved my attention.”
author: robert m drake

quote: “Living never wore one so much as the effort not to live.”
author: Anais Nin

quote: “Happiness is a state of mind, a choice, a way of living; it is not something to be achieved, it is something to be experienced.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Life doesn't just happen to you; youreceive everything in your life based on what you've given.”
author: Rhonda Byrne

quote: “The good thing about being old, is you don’t have to worry about dying young.”
author: Stephen King

quote: “We live out our lives as we are meant to live them-with some choice, with some chance, but mostly as a result of the persons we are.”
author: Terry Brooks

quote: “A truth that no one knows is still the truth.”
author: Sharon Shinn

quote: “Dreams are the language of God.”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “Books have a way of finding their way into our lives, usually, right when we need them the most.”
author: Richard Denney

quote: “There is no illusion greater than fear.”
author: Lao Tzu, Tao Teh Ching

quote: “I admire those who do good and expect nothing in return.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “A photograph shouldn't be just a picture, it should be a philosophy.”
author: Amit Kalantri
